text: Skazhi: "Yesli vashi ottsy, i vashi synov'ya, I vashi brat'ya, i suprugi vashi, I rodstvenniki, i dobro, chto vy priobreli, Torgovyye dela, zastoy v kotorykh vas pugayet, I vash ochag, chto raduyet vash glaz, - Kol' vse eto - mileye vam Allakha i poslannika Yego, Miley bor'by na promysle Gospodnem, To zhdite do tekh por, Poka Svoy prigovor Allakh vam ne ob"yavit". On pravednym putem ne povedet narod rasputnyy
